manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Grey Extra Large Cushion Relieves Pain for Overweight People: The ultimate Orthopedic bariatric Seat Cushion for obese that relieves hemorrhoids pain, pressure ulcers, prostatitis pain, pregnancy pain, gastric reflux, congestion, child birth pain, postpartum pain and lower back pain. Relives pressure on pelvic, coccyx, tailbone, legs and hip bones. We know that all these pain is a pain in the butt! Premium Quality Memory Foam: Contoured high density memory foam which molds into an ergonomic streamlining and shapes according to your body for your comfort. Therapeutic, the perfect consistency, not too firm and won’t flatten out. This pillow is made to support up to 500 pounds. Versatile Uses: The ideal back pain reliever for people that sit for a long period of time. Non-slip rubber bottom provides support on most hard surfaces. Awesome support for office chairs, car seat chairs, wheelchairs, executive chair, sofa, cars seat SUV seat, truck seats, recliner seats or just for comfortable seating on the floor, meditation, and patio furniture. Improves Spinal Alignment & Posture: Doctors & chiropractor recommended extra-large seat cushion for pregnant women, surgery recovery, piriformis, numbness on the back, lumbosacral spondylitis, & fibromyalgia. Removable Machine Washable Cover: Washable velour cushion cover allows you to keep your cushion fresh and clean. Simply remove cover and place in washing machine to have your cushion looking new. Product Dimensions: Dimensions: 18.9”X17.3”X3.1". Conveniently sized to take with you wherever support and comfort is needed. Not too bulky yet large enough for most body types. The Ideal Get Well Gift: Awesome idea for business gift, office gifts, holiday gift, & back surgery recovery gift. About ComfySure: We are an innovative brand specializing in ergonomic equipment to comfort and ease pain. Our motivated staff utilize their expertise to produce ordinary products with extraordinary features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is about 3 -4 inches thick, so you'll definitely sit higher on it. I purchased it because we were driving across the country (27 hours 1 way), and the seats in my friends vehicle weren't very comfy for a larger person like myself. This cushion was a life saver! It was extremely comfortable and held its shape the entire trip. Since it's so thick, I was a little closer to the roof of the vehicle, but it wasn't that big of a deal after I got used to it.I used it on the way, while we were there for a week, and on the way back. It kept its shape and I was comfortable the entire time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pad for my wheelchair!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this for months and it has held up wonderfully! I had a gel filled one before and after a couple of months it sprung a leak and oozed out all over the place!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great place to sit!
reviews.reviewText: Almost too firm! Product works just fine though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Recently I through out my back & needed this cushion to help me push myself up from couch. On one side it is soft & velvety, other side is rubberized & textured so it has traction. I originally had 2 pillows on it for extra height but now only the cushion! It keeps its thickness & I prefer to sit on rubber side just in case I spill something on it, it wipes up easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this item because it claimed to be a good fit for "heavy people".Instructions on bag that contains this compressed cushion say to shake the item vigorously for 5 minutes then put in a dryer with no heat and 2 clean tennis balls for 5 minutes.Don't have a dryer or tennis balls. Shook the item vigorously, albeit not for 5 minutes. Let stand for about an hour before using.Definite improvement over the hard bench I've been sitting on. Provided sufficient cushion and did not completely compress after sitting on it. Seems to be fairly well made and of reasonable quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Finally an advertised 'Firm' cushion that lives up to its claim. Sadly, I sit for most of my work day and the prolonged sitting causes my lower legs to swell and my varicose veins to worsen. I've experimented with different chairs, cushions, wearing compression socks and the bottom line is, the human body was not indented to sit on one place for hours on end but I need to pay the bills so I have continued my search for the perfect solution. This is as close to perfect as I have found. It is larger than my chair but with its perfect amount of firm cushioning, I am making it work. I'm going to buy a second cushion just to have on hand.Side note, if they made a smaller version I would take it on every flight/vacation ... it's just that comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I guess it is memory foam, but this one holds its shape and is large enough to fill my manager size office chair. Liked it so well that I bought a second one for the car. Allows me to sit up high and is very comfortable. Doesn’t quish down, despite my considerable weight. Going to test it on a long road trip soon. I’m actually looking forward to the trip because of this pillow. I can highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars nice pillow but not that firm
reviews.reviewText: If you are getting this just to cover an old chair seat or a leather seat to make it fabric its a great deal. however if your getting it to add cushion to a chair it doesnt do good for that it squishes down pretty flat even though it says firm in the advertisement. I ended up putting a pillow below it to make it firm enough.
Excelente y muy cómodo el producto
This cushion has helped me so much. I use it on an ancient futon which is hard as a rock. The cushion is firm yet comfortable and prevents my back pain. I am really glad I invested in this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Contrario a lo que dicen la mayoria de los comentarios el mio es demasiado suave!
reviews.reviewText: Cuando hice la compra de este cojín busque en las opinones de los compradores y casi todos mencionaban que era muy firme por lo cual me anime a comprarlo ya que yo paso mas de 12 horas al día sentado y necesito algo que no pierda el aconinamiento, inclusive algún comentario decia "Duro como roca" pero no se si sea la misma versión que la que me llego a mi ya que esta es demasiado suave a los pocos minutos (10 mins aprox) ya estas tocando el fondo del asiento donde lo colocaste, sigue siendo comodo pero demasiado suave todo lo contrario a lo que se menciona en otras opiniones del producto!

Nice wide cushion, firm initially when you sit on it, it remains supportive however after one hour it feels soft. Overall not a fan of memory foam not convinced this is a supportive seat for bariatric folks.
